name: Accordion
description: Expandable information panels (FAQ style). Great for FAQs, topic overviews, and reference material.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate a JSON object with a title and panels array

panels.title: What is a cell?
panels.content: A cell is the basic structural and functional unit of all living organisms. Cells are often called the "building blocks of life."

panels.title: What are the main types of cells?
panels.content:
There are two main types:

  • Prokaryotic cells - Simple cells without a nucleus (bacteria)
  • Eukaryotic cells - Complex cells with a nucleus (plants, animals)

panels.title: What is the function of the nucleus?
panels.content: The nucleus is the control center of the cell. It contains the cell's genetic material (DNA) and controls cell growth, metabolism, and reproduction.
